name: nmhmrcl1
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cnmhm, c2)), wcel(c1, cnlm))

body.origin:

comment: Reverse closure for a normed module homomorphism. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Oct-2015.)
